005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter;
007
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsonFormatVisitors.JsonFormatTypes;
009
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.AbstractDataTypeAdapter;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDayTimeDurationItem;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
014
015import java.time.Duration;
016import java.time.format.DateTimeParseException;
017import java.util.List;
018
019import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
020
021import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
022
023public class DayTimeAdapter
024    extends AbstractDataTypeAdapter<Duration, IDayTimeDurationItem> {
025  @NonNull
026  private static final List<QName> NAMES = ObjectUtils.notNull(
027      List.of(new QName(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH.toASCIIString(), "day-time-duration")));
028
029  DayTimeAdapter() {
030    super(Duration.class);
031  }
032
033  @Override
034  public List<QName> getNames() {
035    return NAMES;
036  }
037
038  @Override
039  public JsonFormatTypes getJsonRawType() {
040    return JsonFormatTypes.STRING;
041  }
042
043  @Override
044  public Duration copy(Object obj) {
045    // value in immutable
046    return (Duration) obj;
047  }
048
049  @SuppressWarnings("null")
050  @Override
051  public Duration parse(String value) {
052    try {
053      return Duration.parse(value);
054    } catch (DateTimeParseException ex) {
055      throw new IllegalArgumentException(ex.getLocalizedMessage(), ex);
056    }
057  }
058
059  @Override
060  public Class<IDayTimeDurationItem> getItemClass() {
061    return IDayTimeDurationItem.class;
062  }
063
064  @Override
065  public IDayTimeDurationItem newItem(Object value) {
066    Duration item = toValue(value);
067    return IDayTimeDurationItem.valueOf(item);
068  }
069
070}
